subject: Islamic Science

overview.description: Integrated Islamic science curriculum that explores scientific principles through Islamic perspectives, historical Muslim contributions to science, and contemporary applications of Islamic ethics in scientific research

learning_objectives: Understand scientific principles from Islamic historical and philosophical perspectives
Master fundamental concepts in physics, chemistry, and biology with Islamic context
Apply Islamic ethics and values to scientific research and applications
Appreciate historical Muslim contributions to scientific advancement
Integrate Islamic worldview with modern scientific methodology

units.title: Islamic Philosophy of Science and Historical Foundations
learning_outcomes: Understand Islamic philosophy of knowledge and scientific inquiry
Appreciate historical Muslim contributions to mathematics and astronomy
Analyze the integration of Islamic values with scientific method
Develop appreciation for the Islamic Golden Age of science

lessons.title: Muslim Scientists and the Development of Scientific Method
objectives: Study contributions of Ibn al-Haytham, Al-Biruni, and other Muslim scientists
Understand how Islamic principles influenced scientific methodology
Analyze the role of Islamic institutions in preserving and advancing knowledge

activities.description: Research and present on famous Muslim scientists and their contributions
Analyze how Islamic principles shaped early scientific methodology
Study the role of Bayt al-Hikma and other Islamic centers of learning
Discuss the lasting impact of Islamic contributions to science

resources: Maps and timelines of Islamic scientific achievements
Documentary materials on Islamic Golden Age
assessment_criteria: Analysis of Islamic influence on science (25%)
cross_curricular_connections: History: Islamic civilization and cultural achievements
Geography: Centers of learning in the Islamic world

units.title: Physics and Astronomy in Islamic Tradition
learning_outcomes: Understand fundamental physics concepts with Islamic historical context
Study Islamic astronomical traditions and observational methods
Apply physics principles to understand Islamic practices and rituals
Appreciate Islamic contributions to optics and mechanics

lessons.title: Islamic Astronomy and the Science of Timekeeping
objectives: Understand Islamic astronomical observations and calculations
Study the determination of prayer times and Qibla direction
Analyze Islamic contributions to astronomical instruments

activities.description: Calculate prayer times and Qibla direction using astronomical principles
Study Islamic astronomical instruments like astrolabe and quadrant
Conduct astronomical observations using traditional and modern methods
Discuss modern applications of Islamic astronomical knowledge

resources: Star charts and celestial observation tools

units.title: Chemistry and Alchemy in Islamic Tradition
learning_outcomes: Understand chemistry concepts through Islamic historical development
Study contributions of Jabir ibn Hayyan and Al-Razi to chemistry
Apply chemical principles to understand traditional Islamic medicine
Analyze the transition from alchemy to modern chemistry in Islamic context

lessons.title: Islamic Alchemy and the Foundations of Chemistry
objectives: Study the work of Jabir ibn Hayyan and early Islamic chemists
Understand chemical processes described in Islamic texts
Analyze the philosophical and practical aspects of Islamic alchemy

activities.description: Recreate historical chemical experiments from Islamic texts
Analyze chemical descriptions in classical Islamic texts
Compare historical Islamic chemistry with modern chemical principles
Discuss the philosophical foundations of Islamic alchemy

units.title: Biology and Medicine in Islamic Tradition
learning_outcomes: Understand biological concepts through Islamic medical traditions
Study contributions of Ibn Sina, Al-Razi, and other Islamic physicians
Apply Islamic principles to modern medical ethics and practice
Analyze holistic approaches to health in Islamic tradition

lessons.title: Islamic Medicine and Holistic Health Approaches
objectives: Study Islamic approaches to anatomy, physiology, and disease
Understand the integration of spiritual and physical healing
Analyze contemporary relevance of Islamic medical principles

activities.description: Study anatomical and medical descriptions from Islamic texts
Analyze Islamic holistic approaches to health and healing
Apply Islamic medical principles to modern healthcare challenges
Discuss Islamic medical ethics in contemporary contexts

resources: Classical Islamic medical texts and translations

historical_experiments: Reproduction of classical Islamic scientific experiments
Chemical processes described in Islamic texts
contemporary_applications: Modern applications of Islamic scientific principles
Integration of Islamic ethics with current scientific research
Environmental projects based on Islamic stewardship principles
Health and wellness programs incorporating Islamic holistic approaches
research_projects: Independent investigation of specific Muslim scientists
Comparative study of Islamic and modern scientific approaches
Analysis of Islamic contributions to specific scientific fields
Contemporary relevance of Islamic scientific principles

formative_assessments: Weekly reflection on Islamic scientific principles
Comparison essays between Islamic and modern science
summative_assessments: Comprehensive examinations on Islamic science history and principles (40%)
Independent research project on chosen Islamic scientist or topic (25%)

historical_texts: Translations of classical Islamic scientific works
Biographies and collected works of Muslim scientists
Historical accounts of Islamic scientific institutions
Comparative studies of Islamic and Western science
laboratory_equipment: Replicas of historical Islamic scientific instruments
Modern laboratory equipment for comparative experiments
digital_resources: Digital libraries of Islamic scientific texts
Virtual tours of historical Islamic scientific centers
Interactive timelines of Islamic scientific achievements
Online databases of Muslim scientists and their contributions
